section.p:
You pass the witch’s hand and the parrot fungus across the table to Bakhan.
Cross them off
your Adventure Sheet. Bakhan hisses in delight, and shuffles out of the room. Some hours later, a woman with ice-blue eyes, and long black hair, serene and beautiful, walks in.
‘I am Bakhan,’ she says in a voice like honey. ‘I cannot thank you enough. Bring me some selenium ore, and I will fashion you a gift as a token of my gratitude.’

If you have some selenium ore, .
If not, you leave. .
